greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Maximal digit value in primorial base expansion of A327860(n): a(n) = A328114(A327860(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..30030
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
program: A327860(n) = { my(s=0, m=1, p=2, e); while(n, e = (n%p); m *= (p^e); s += (e/p); n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (s*m); };
A328114(n) = { my(s=0, p=2); while(n, s = max(s,(n%p)); n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (s); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 15 2019
